解説動画、課題を毎週LUNAにあげるので、期日までに取り組む。ZOOMによるSessionを授業計画のとおり開催する予定にしていますが、ZOOMを開催する場合は、事前にLUNAのAnnouncementでリンク先等を知らせます。

Online course (On-demand)＊You will be notified when a zoom session will be held.
In this online course, students will read the textbook while watching the video uploaded on LUNA, do the assignments on LUNA after watching the video, and submit the assignment by the deadline. You will follow the process (several steps) to complete each essay. By doing the assignments uploaded on LUNA, you will complete each step and finally complete three essays. You also write a journal 6 times. Take an in-class timed writing test and final quiz.
